projects.name: Spinor Helicity Formalism Part 1
projects.summary: Spinor helicity formalism provides a method for calculating scattering cross sections in high energy QCD calculations. In the first part of this project I have learnt the conventional method of calculating scattering amplitude and cross section and their application in QED.
